ROW.NAME: 我创建的事务
ROW.DATDSC: select a.title||' '||to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')|| '【'||decode(a.stat,'0','新建','1','处理中','2','已处理','3','处理完','4','未处理','未知状态')||'】' name, a.guid ,a.id,'show.sp?grdid='||a.id url from trkhdr a where a.crtusr=lower('[%SYS_USRID]')

SELECT A.ID,A.NAME||'('||COUNT(*)||')' NAME,A.GUID ,'Layout.sp?id=trk_BYTYP&trktyp=&trkprj='|| A.id url FROM PRJ A,TRKHDR B
WHERE B.PROJECT=A.ID GROUP BY A.ID,A.NAME,A.GUID ORDER BY A.ID
SELECT A.ID,'■ '||A.NAME||'('||COUNT(*)||')' NAME,A.GUID FROM trktyp A,TRKHDR B WHERE B.SHOW=A.ID GROUP BY A.ID,A.NAME,A.GUID ORDER BY A.ID

select '●'||title||' '||to_char(crtdat,'MM/DD') name,id,guid from trkhdr a where show like '[%TRKTYP]%'
order by crtdat desc

select '0' id,'你有12笔待处理事务' name , '1' guid from dual union select '1' id,'你处理的事务平均时间为1.4天' name , '1' guid from dual union select '2' id,'昨日新增事务2笔' name , '1' guid from dual
union select '3' id,'昨日你完成事务1笔' name , '1' guid from dual

select a.id, a.title 标题, c.name 创建人, to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') 创建时间, e.name 事务类型, p.name 项目名称, ss.name 状态, pp.name 优先级, cc.name 最后处理人, a.guid from trkhdr a,v_usr c ,trktyp e,v_usr cc,v_prj p, v_PRIO pp , v_trkstat ss where a.SELFORG=c.orgid and a.crtusr=c.id and a.AIMORG=cc.orgid and a.dtlusr=cc.id and a.PRIO = pp.id and a.stat=ss.id and cc.id=lower('[%SYS_USRID]') and cc.orgid='[%SYS_ORGID]' and a.project =p.id and a.show =e.id and a.stat like '[%trkstat]%' and e.id not in ('4','5','6','7','8','9','10','16','17') and a.prio like '[%PRIO]%' and a.PROJECT like '[%prj]%' and a.crtusr like '[%create]%' and a.title like '%[%title]%' and e.id like '[%trktyp]%' order by to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') desc
